tgt_original: 「憍尸迦！ 云何『菩薩摩訶薩般若波羅蜜，為迴向薩婆若心故，亦為不高心故』？

src_original: śakra āha: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca dānaṃ dadāti,  tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ  śrāvakebhyaś ca sa kṛpaṇavanīyakārthena yācanakebhyaś ca sa tena dānenānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 」釋提桓因白佛言： 「世尊！ 菩薩摩訶薩若行世間檀波羅蜜，布施諸佛、辟支佛、聲聞及諸貧窮、乞匂、行路人，是菩薩無方便故生高心。

src_original: laukikyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
tgt_original: 若行世間尸羅波羅蜜，言：

src_original: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 『我行尸羅波羅蜜，我能具足尸羅波羅蜜。

src_original: carataḥ, evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
tgt_original: 『我行羼提波羅蜜、毘梨耶波羅蜜、禪波羅蜜； 我行般若波羅蜜，我修般若波羅蜜。

src_original: so 'nayā prajñāpāramitayānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
tgt_original: 』以是世間般若波羅蜜，無方便故生高心。

src_original: bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayet,  evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayet,  evaṃ bhavaty aham āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  āryasatyāni bhāvayet,
tgt_original: 『我修四念處，我具足四念處。

src_original: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryasatyāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 』無方便力故生高心。

src_original: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattir bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  vimokṣān bhāvayet,  evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr bhāvayet,  evaṃ bhavaty aham anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 』自念言：

src_original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayet,
tgt_original: 『我修空、無相、無作三昧；

src_original: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  abhijñāṃ bhāvayet,  evaṃ bhavaty aham abhijñāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  samādhīn bhāvayet,  evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samādhīn bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
tgt_original: 我修一切三昧門，當得一切陀羅尼門。

src_original: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvadhāraṇīḥ pratilapsye sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  tasyaivaṃ (ŚsP_II-4_20)  bhavaty ahaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,  tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidā bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 我修佛十力、四無所畏、十八不共法，我當成就眾生，我當淨佛世界，我當得一切種智。

src_original: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 』著吾我無方便力故生高心。

src_original: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu caran unnāmaṃ gacchaty
tgt_original: 如是菩薩摩訶薩行世間善法，著吾我故生高心。

src_original: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvati sa tāvan na vipramuṣyati,  yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā bhavanti,
tgt_original: 從諸佛聞法，至得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，終不中忘；
